sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SOUTHAM, a small town of the hundred of Knightlow, in the county of Warwick, eightythree miles from London. It has little or no trade. The inhabitants amounted in 1801 to 935, in 1811 to 1007, in 1821 to 1161, and in 1831 to 1256.
